Classic Collection

When you want to create an ambience that never goes out of style, consider Pegasus Classic Collections. Their timeless appeal calls upon both historical and antique design motifs to create a timeless heirloom quality. Luxury is only for the privileged? What gave you that idea?

Swept back in a time reminiscent of French Provincial or a touch of Tutor? The Estate collection delivers historic character of intricate appointments in deep hues of walnut and cherry. Unique elements like leather and granite combine with elaborate hand-crafted finishes to create a grand vision of a time past. Luxury is not only for the privileged. What gave you that idea?
